metadata.synopsis: Jaheira yells at Minsc to stop being an idiot while fighting him as the Stone Lord.
metadata.how_to_trigger: CTY_Main_ARecruit JaheiraGo to Abandoned Cistern and start Roah bribe scene

0.speaker: Jaheira
0.text: Think, you idiot! For once, just bloody THINK!
0.context: NodeContext: Frustrated, concerned for her friend - wants him to stop fighting us, though she knows shouting alone is futile.
